description:
A calm and noble swordsman. He is one of the most powerful warlords of the Sorcerer Shogun, and his devotion to Kall-Su is particularly strong. His special technique, the Banisher of Night Emperor Sword, which he performs with his Shu Tora Sword 《Strad》, is a blow of such speed that it appears to ordinary people as a momentary flash of light. Hence, he is known as the user of the "Speed of Light Strike".
Source: Official page
name: Yngwie von Mattstrom
